entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing near noon. Fog patches over northern sections early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023
